overview: Five year old Leyla who has deep emotional connections with nature and animals, lives with her parents and grandparents in a country house located in the middle of a huge garden. Only some days left for Eid el Adha (Muslim feast for sacrifice) and there is a feast rush in the house. Sheep which is bought to be sacrificed in the feast, lives in the hut next to house for several days. But Leyla who visits the sheep occasionally to slop it has a smart idea to rescue it.
title: Celebration
